sentences.en: Alfred Berg of the University of Washington in Seattle led the study.
sentences.cn: 西雅图华盛顿大学的阿尔佛雷德?伯格带领了这次研究.

sentences.en: As the captain watched, the ship came into view from behind the berg.
sentences.cn: 当船长注视着的时候, 那船从冰的后面出现了.

sentences.en: At a time when sprawling shelves of ice are disintegrating, this berg seemed to signify more.
sentences.cn: 当伸展的冰架正在瓦解的时侯，这座冰山的出现更显得意味深长。

sentences.en: Berg tilts his head and a mischievous look crosses his face.
sentences.cn: 伯格侧着头，脸上掠过一丝调皮的神情。

sentences.en: Besides, it that comes to berg in management or submerged reef conceals all problems in management.
sentences.cn: 此外,库存还会成为管理中的“冰山”或“暗礁”, 它会掩盖管理中的所有问题.

sentences.en: Economists worry that this may be only the tip of the icecream - berg: inflation seems to resurgent.
sentences.cn: 经济学家担心,这种现象也许只是“冰淇淋山”的一角: 通货膨胀似乎即将卷土重来.

sentences.en: Switzerland's Marcus berg took the opening stage of the 53 th Tour of Spain on Saturday.
sentences.cn: 星期六,瑞士选手马库斯·伯格获得了第53届环西班牙自行车大赛首个赛段的冠军.

sentences.en: The Wozzeck by Alban Berg was a classics opera in 20 th Century.
sentences.cn: 阿尔班·贝尔格的歌剧《沃采克》是20世纪歌剧中的一部经典之作.

sentences.en: While a Polar bear sleeping on an ice berg with its paws clutched around it like a toddler holding their teddy bear is truly cute.
sentences.cn: 当北极熊在冰山上睡觉时，爪子抓住周围，就像一个蹒跚学步的婴儿抓着他们的泰迪熊一样，那是真的非常可爱！
